title: Data Science Practical Competency Enhancement: Hybrid English Communication Competencies for Corporate Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary and sentence comprehension skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can use basic workplace English expressions (meetings, emails, presentations) with 80% accuracy.
Learners complete self-directed learning modules at least three times weekly using mobile devices, establishing self-regulated learning habits.
Learners can deliver a 10-minute business English presentation according to peer-assessment criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
